title: Chalo Koi Baat Nahi
overview: Chalo Koi Baat Nahi is a sketch comedy show that takes a satirical look at the various issues and challenges encapsulating modern India and how a citizen engages with them on a daily basis. Each episode focuses on a specific pillar of modern India such as media, sports, hospitals, education, railways, environment, etc, and through a mix of sketch, stand up and music gives hilarious insights into what makes Indians keep moving forward mouthing the adage 'koi baat nahi.'
